short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can simply and precisely share what you see on the Internet web
short.zh_CN: 你可以简单并准确地分享你在互联网上看到的东西

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can simply and precisely share what you see on the Internet web
1.One-click sharing
    You can easily share your selected content or video, it is just a link, can be very convenient to send to anyone.
2.Precise sharing
    Anyone who opens your link can quickly and accurately see what you're sharing, Highlight the text.
3.Valid verification
    It can verify if the content shared at the time has changed (videos are not currently supported).
